channel.title: Token Utility in the MESG Economy
channel.description:
This article describes the utility of the MESG Token and what it means for you.

The MESG Token is the fuel for the MESG Network, and its primary use is to create executions. MESG is a blockchain of executions and any node on the network can process executions and get rewarded for their work.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/token-utility-in-the-mesg-economy/

item.title: Token Utility in the MESG Economy
item.dc:creator: Anthony
item.description:
Hello @Jazear_Brooks, thanks for letting us know. The issue has been fixed, you can now access it again. You can also directly access to these services through the explorer https://explorer.testnet.mesg.com/.

Read full topic
item.source: Token Utility in the MESG Economy
